Summary: Unknown flying object found hovering over horizon.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy family was going outside to get into the car when they spotted this object flying very slowly over the horizon. We immediately grabbed the camera and snapped as many pictures as possible. Have a few more as I was typing this. I got a few more close ups. Please contact me if you want to see the rest of the pictures I have downloaded. Thanks, Carol
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Bethel Park
There were no other sightings in Bethel Park on or around April 13th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
